page.title: 08LIVING SOUTH OF BARRHEAD
page.content: Being a farming area the working day is a long one starting at 6am. or 7am. and often not finishing before 10pm. or 11pm. at times all seven days of the week. Leisure time is limited but well used. The{YOUNG FARMERS' CLUB} plays an important part in the lives of the younger generation of both sexes. Most married women in the area are members of the{WOMEN'S RURAL INSTITUTE which plays an important part in the {social}and{civic} life of the community. {CURLING}is a popular pastime with many of the farmers and their wives. The{NEILSTON AGRICULTURAL SHOW,}in the neighbouring town of Neilston, is a major social and professional event with {STOCK, HANDCRAFT, BAKING, {PRESERVES & PET}judging,{EQUESTRIAN events and attractions of all kinds.
